item.title: Augmenting guitar cabinet impulse response for comfortable use with headphones
item.description: If you play electric guitar and ever thought on how to improve your experience when using any software amp emulation this is short instruction for you. It’s a description of a technique for augmenting the impulse response of a guitar cabinet with early reflections, which in my opinion helps to liven up the sound and brings the sense of space. The resulting IR is primary intended not for recording purposes, but mainly for practice wearing headphones.
